title: Plat 4 Looking for a team in the Open Ladder
body:
Hay all 

Plat 4 Support main looking for a team to compete in the Open ladder.
Add me in game for a chat

Cheers
Alphariius

replies.body: Main is plat 5 and this account won't be far from it soon would love to join I main adc/support and I have the best support duo partner we never lose lane
ill add you Plottel and we can go from there :)

Plat V Mid main also looking for a team. The three of us could start looking for a top and jungle?
IGN: Plottel
Gold 3 Here also looking for a team. Main ADC.
